Key Match Events: Jalen Suggs left the game in a wheelchair due to back spasms
Tristan da Silva led the team in scoring with 25 points
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley said Suggs was in a lot of pain and will be re-evaluated Saturday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner have missed significant time with oblique injuries
Moe Wagner is out for the season due to a torn ACL
Anthony Black and Gary Harris are out due to respective back and hamstring injuries
Others: Jalen Suggs is averaging a career-high 16.8 points, along with 4.2 rebounds, 3.8 assists, 1.5 steals, and a block this campaign
